entry.title: Category Definitions
entry.content:
Categories

Categories pertain to the different departments and operations of openlectures. Categories are defined at the header of a post.

---
layout: post
title: "Category Definitions"
date: 2013-09-30 00:28
comments: true
categories: [Category1, Category2, Category3]
---

All posts should contain the category that it resides in and its master category.

List of Categories

  • Guides
    • Writing
    • Filming
    • Slide Design
    • Post Processing
    • Design
  • Processes
    • Recruitment
    • Welfare
  • Organizational Structure
    • Partners
    • Singapore
    • United States
  • Contract Templates
    • Non Disclosure
    • Internship
    • Employment
    • Recognition
